html:
8.12.18  3:36 pm   What's the 4th melody note in the new song?

     A

8.12.18  3:17 pm   what day will your next video be released?

     as soon as humanly possible

8.12.18  2:07 pm   what is the first thing you would do if you woke up as a cat?

     cats are always awake

8.12.18  1:15 pm   is there anything exclusive to your bandcamp page?

     some things. i think mexican cheese is somewhere in there

8.12.18  1:14 pm   If there could be a Bill Wurtz themed pinball machine, what would it have on it?

     it's almost more important what's in it

8.12.18  1:12 pm   Was this tweet inspired by 8.8.18  2:20 pm ?

     not but they are both based on the same thing

8.12.18  12:48 pm   Why are trains such good places for prose?

     because everything is moving and yet very still at the same time

8.12.18  12:46 pm   what are your thoughts on the Roman Pants Ban in the 4th century?

     reminds me of many other bans

     did this affect your writing of hello sexy pants in any way?

     no but they are both a result of the same thing, and that is the sheer popularity of pants

8.12.18  12:11 pm   why arent you more abrasive than you are

     i have an electric shock collar which gives me an electric shock any time i am too abrasive

8.12.18  11:59 am   i'm so worried all of a sudden about if my admiration for people goes to far. it's okay to have 'heroes' right??

     sure as long as you don't try to vapourize them

8.12.18  11:58 am   why is b a letter?

     i don't know but there's no sense in worrying about it now

8.12.18  11:51 am   bill, can you help me cure my depression?

     i will try

8.12.18  11:48 am   what is your next song about?

     radiant joy and rejoiceful revelatory splendor

8.12.18  11:46 am   do you think there is a growing amount of people choosing to do what they love on their own without the compromises of working with others?

     yes

8.12.18  11:26 am   Your opinion on music

     it usually has the opinions on me

8.12.18  10:31 am   how do i get this bird shit off my window

     only bird pee. you must wait for another bird to pee on the shit

8.12.18  9:48 am   happy birthday 3 days ago

     why not today

8.12.18  9:37 am   why does it say y2k or whatever on the bottom of the expert page?

     seemed like a good bench mark

8.12.18  8:48 am   is it weird?

     you didn't say which thing but everything is weird so safe to say yes

8.12.18  8:48 am   are you my secret biological father?

     i don't think so

8.12.18  8:26 am   tips on getting over someone?

     find yourself again

8.12.18  7:56 am   i've no idea how to start transcribing a song...
should i just first heard the melody... and then the chords..?
did you just use your ear and nothing else? it seems so intimidating...

     just chart one element for now. whichever element you think you haven't mastered. if you haven't mastered rhythm, i recommend figuring that out first. just chart of the rhythm of the melody to every song you know, nothing else. if that's already a breeze for you then chart out the melody with notes. if that's already a breeze for you then chart out just the chords. if all these things are no problem, then chart out just the lyrics. if all these things are a breeze for you then get lost in the jungle for a few days and then when you come back start writing your own songs

8.12.18  7:49 am   what would you do after a disappointment?

     call a team meeting

8.12.18  7:20 am   When is your next upload?

     as soon as the item to be uploaded is finished

8.12.18  4:09 am   how does intelligence make everything so dumb and stupid?

     it can be illuminating to hear both sides of the picture

8.12.18  3:38 am   I don't wanna go to school, am I stupid?

     perhaps the school is stupid

8.12.18  2:12 am   what do you think defines who a person truly is?

     the person and the entire sphere around them, as far out as they have influence or are influenced

      or is there no way to understand the full potential of what someone can be

     potential seems limitless

8.12.18  1:34 am   are you lying

     no but that sounds like fun

8.12.18  1:33 am   does it get easier

     yes, and harder

8.12.18  1:16 am   the intracacies of life, thoughts processes, intense range of emotions, etc did not come into existence by accident and without something first causing it to happen. 

     some things are caused by multiple things

8.12.18  1:06 am   what song was the person referring to when saying "open the door cause i got to know if there's something more whatever it is i'll believe in it"

     got to know what's going on

8.12.18  1:00 am   maybe a dumb question but how do i find more music that i like? it seems to take so long for me to find a song that i really like

     my favorite way is to cruise the past century's pop charts (via playback.fm) although that might be against some people's religion

8.12.18  12:52 am   8.11.18  4:20 pm if the game really happened, who do you predict would win?

     the viewer

8.11.18  11:44 pm   Who doesn't like people?

     almost everyone, in some ways

8.11.18  11:28 pm   how do you find a thing if it's not there?

     don't look there

8.11.18  10:33 pm   What's going on in reality?

     it's kind of like a pow wow

8.11.18  9:58 pm   Are there too many questions or just enough? 

     there are infinite which is just enough

8.11.18  9:54 pm   Have you had a super power where you could wipe any song from existence and people's memories of that song, thereby being able to record any song of your chosing (thriller, billie jean despacito, gangnam style, the macerana, etc) and people will think you wrote it... would you use that power?

     no

8.11.18  9:50 pm   Any thoughts regarding clocks?

     a timeless classic

8.11.18  9:50 pm   If happy meals are for kids, do adults eat sad meals?

     happy and sad meals are for everyone

8.11.18  9:36 pm   I keep doing absurdly long and meaningless stuff that takes hours to do to stop myself from having depressive episodes and I'm starting to run out of things to do. How do I stop myself from going insane?

     take a walk

8.11.18  9:36 pm   What will my next fortune cookie fortune be?

     you are an avid seamstress

8.11.18  9:27 pm   if you could make any activity into an olympic sport, what would you choose?

     ad closing

8.11.18  9:26 pm   how did you learn how to play the music from pilotwings?  did you have perfect pitch, or did someone with perfect pitch tell you what notes to play and when?  

     perfect pitch wouldn't be necessary to do that. only relative pitch

      also, are you going to do another instrumental?

     would be more exciting if it was connected to a visual experience in some way

8.11.18  9:16 pm   8.10.18  7:28 pm why can't you just answer the question, we dont want this funny/weird stuff

     who's we and if they don't like weird stuff then what are they doing at bill wurtz online

8.11.18  8:47 pm   do you remember which vine was the one where you said: "i am the mailman."? thanks, bill, this is very important.

     that video should be on the videos page with a release date sometime between march and may, 2015

8.11.18  8:33 pm   How do I be better?

     up up down down left right left right b a

8.11.18  8:18 pm   how do i interact with oatmeal more?

     you could eat it twice

8.11.18  8:04 pm   do you like lizards

     yes, and the lizardry they perform

8.11.18  8:03 pm   when will the horses eat their hay?

     at haytime
